value:
I just got back from sparring with
Alfonse. He has real skill, and he
never lost his calm.$k$pI'd like to challenge him again.

When I lived in a far-off village, I'd
fight any who made it there. Chrom
and Robin's army was the toughest.

I see that you're on patrol again. Don't
forget to eat! Meat's good for keeping
your energy up. I'll get you some.

Sometimes I get jealous of our foes...$k$pIf we were enemies, I could cross
swords with the Order of Heroes and
any of the Heroes whenever I wanted.

I was training. Training is something
you can do anywhere and anytime.$k$pTake a look around here—you could
do push-ups, run laps, or practice
your form. Hmm...

Lots of strong fighters here. I should
challenge somebody before I head
back to $Nf.

Not good enough. I won't settle
for being less than the best.

Nothing beats the feel of
accomplishment.
Maybe I need to train harder.

For giving me this power... You
have my thanks. Sincerely.

Name's Priam. I'm a descendant of
the Radiant Hero, but my strength
comes from my own efforts.

What's this, now? If you're here, that
means you're finally ready to duel.
Weapon at the ready!$k$pYes, I know your weapon isn't for
fighting. Summon your Heroes, and
I'll fell each and every one.$k$pOh! You can't summon Heroes unless
you're at the ruins? I see... When my
sword is in my hand, I get overeager.$k$pWhen I'm faced with a strong
opponent, It's always like this. I think
Chrom and Robin got sick of it.$k$pWhat about you?$k$pI'm glad to hear it. I don't want you
frustrated with me. I want to be at
your side—your strongest sword.
むん！
どりゃあっ！
ぐあっ！
You're strong...!
This is the end!
The strong survive!
Think you can take it?
Defeat? Never!
This is the end for me...
Hmm...
I will become stronger—stronger than any man alive!
You wish to learn all I know of fighting? Prepare yourself. This journey will be a long one.
A warrior's life extends no further than that of the weapon he wields. Fail to perform proper maintenance, and... Hmph.
The act of eating is to take the soul of others and make it into one's own flesh. We should eat with a spirit of thanks.
The road to strength... For you, I guess, that means seeking stronger Heroes, doesn't it?
As a weapon, Ragnell may be reaching its limit...
Usually, I don't take orders from anybody. But I guess working for you is good enough for now.
Yeah.
Now what?
A worthy rival...
